data.name: plFriendlyName.Help
data.value: Displays the name of the module.

data.name: plTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a title for the module. The title will appear in the title bar of the container for this module, if supported by the container.

data.name: plAllTabs.Help
data.value: Check the box to to display the module in the same location on all site pages.

data.name: plVisibility.Help
data.value: Choose the default visibility for this module. I.e. whether the module is collapsed or expanded.

data.name: plTab.Help
data.value: Select the page this module instance will be moved to.

data.name: plHeader.Help
data.value: Enter header text that will appear above the content of this module.

data.name: plFooter.Help
data.value: Enter footer text that will appear below the content of this module.

data.name: plIcon.Help
data.value: Select an icon to display in the title bar of this module.

data.name: plAlign.Help
data.value: Select the default alignment of module content.

data.name: plColor.Help
data.value: Enter a color name or hexadecimal value for the background of this module.

data.name: plBorder.Help
data.value: Enter a border width for the module.

data.name: plModuleContainer.Help
data.value: Select a container for the module.

data.name: plPermissions.Help
data.value: Select the View and Edit permissions by checking/unchecking the boxes in the grid. Check the Inherit View Permissions box to use the page permission for the module.

data.name: plCacheTime.Help
data.value: Enter the number of seconds the content of this module is cached.

data.name: plStartDate.Help
data.value: Select the start date for displaying this module. The module will only be visible to users with Manage permissions prior to this date.

data.name: plEndDate.Help
data.value: Select the end date for displaying this module. The module will only be visible to users with Manage permissions after this date.

data.name: plMoniker.Help
data.value: A unique identifier for this module on the page. This can be used by WEB API callers to set the context of the Tab and Module context.

data.name: plDefault.Help
data.value: Check this box to use the Page Settings of this module as the default settings when adding new modules. Administrators only.

data.name: plAllModules.Help
data.value: Check this box to apply the Page Settings of this module to all existing modules. Administrators only.

data.name: plDisplayTitle.Help
data.value: Check this box to display the module container.

data.name: plDisplayPrint.Help
data.value: Check this box to enable printing on this module.

data.name: plDisplaySyndicate.Help
data.value: Check this box to enable RSS on this module.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
Module Settings

Manage the Module Settings for the current Page. This allows you to specify characteristics of the module including content, permissions, and display properties.

data.name: valBorder.ErrorMessage
data.value: Invalid Border (must be a number between 0 and 9).

data.name: valEndDate2.ErrorMessage
data.value: End Date must be after Start Date.

data.name: plNewTabs.Help
data.value: Check this box to add the module to new pages only. Administrators only.

data.name: plWebSlice.Help
data.value: Check this box to make this module an IE8 Web Slice.

data.name: plWebSliceExpiry.Help
data.value: Enter a date when the Web Slice will expire or leave blank to use the module's end date.

data.name: plWebSliceTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a title for the Web Slice or leave blank to use the module title.

data.name: plWebSliceTTL.Help
data.value: Enter the Time to Live (TTL) for this Web Slice in minutes or leave blank to use the module's cache time (converted to minutes).

data.name: valWebSliceTTL.ErrorMessage
data.value: Invalid TTL - value must be an integer.

data.name: InstalledOn.Text
data.value: This module has been added to the following pages:

data.name: InstalledOn.Help
data.value: This list displays the pages this module was added to using the Add Existing Module feature. An existing module can be added to other pages by using the Add Existing Module feature.

data.name: MsgInstalledOnNone.Text
data.value: This module instance has not been added to any additional pages.

data.name: MsgInstalledOnAll.Text
data.value: This module instance is displayed on all pages.

data.name: ModuleExists.Text
data.value: This module already exists on the target page (it may be in the Recycle Bin) and only one instance of a module can exist on a page.

data.name: CacheProvider.Help
data.value: Select the provider to use for this page.

data.name: CacheDuration.Help
data.value: Enter the duration (in seconds) to cache the page for. This must be an integer.

data.name: CacheDurationWarning.Text
data.value: This module has indicated a recommendation to disable caching (select NONE from the Output Cache Provider list above). Enabling caching on this module is not recommended and may cause the module to display stale data.

data.name: plTags.Help
data.value: Select items from the drop-down to tag this module.

data.name: plAdminBorder.Help
data.value: Check this box to suppress the message at the top of the module, stating that it is only visible to administrators (if no additional permissions granted).

data.name: defaultCultureLabel.Help
data.value: Click this link to view the version of this module in the default culture.

data.name: lblNoRecords.Text
data.value: This module has not been added to any other pages.

data.name: AllowIndexLabel.Help
data.value: Check this box if the module should be indexed by search crawlers.

data.name: isShareableLabel.Help
data.value: Check this box to allow the module to be shared across sites.

data.name: isShareableViewOnlyLabel.Help
data.value: Check this box to restrict the module to be shared as View Only.

data.name: MonikerExists.Text
data.value: The new value of the moniker already exists; it must be unique in the portal.
